name: Hostal Casa Aventura

reviews.text: Located in the heart of Valpo's historic/touristic district, Casa Aventura represents great value for money. Excellent breakfast at a family table (i.e. fruits, eggs, warm bread, fresh jams, etc.), cosy beds with real duvets, and no bunk beds in the dorms. Staff is friendly, helpful, professional, and the owner is serious about keeping the place clean. Great budget choice!
reviews.title: VERY comfortable beds, great breakfast

reviews.text: Dorms really big, comfortable and convenient with lots of space to put your things and good lockers. Also, only 4 people in a dorm which was great. And perfect location in valparaiso close to the elevator that can take you back up the hill after grocery shopping or to the little coffee shop overlooking the port. The breakfast was fantastic and fresh and kept going until 11am every day around the big table. I met so many interesting travellers and everyone was so friendly yet at the same time it wasn't a loud party hostel so you could get sleep in the evenings. The owners are also so friendly and lined me up with lots of maps and information. Also I arrived on the night bus at 6am and they let me sleep on their sofa bed until my dorm was ready and then fed me an enormous breakfast. Really lovely!
reviews.title: Big 4 bed dorms with real beds (not bunks), in a great location with great facilities and breaky.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the Casa Aventura could not be better in the heart of the old part of Valparaiso. We spent 4 days there and felt very safe walking all around the hills. The visit to the Pablo Neruda house was one of the main highlights.
reviews.title: Location, breakfast and staff were all great

reviews.text: We agree that the breakfasts were great and it was so pleasant to sit with people of different ages, nationalities and share experiences. The staff were extremely pleasant and friendly. The Hostal was very good value for money
reviews.title: I just loved this place

reviews.text: As you will see from the picture, we had a big room and I was able to do some work
reviews.title: Casa Adventura

description: In an historical house our guests find accommodation in spacious double and three-bed rooms with shared bathrooms. A good fully equipped kitchen offers the possibility of self-catering. Over a hearty breakfast you can get in contact with other travelers or pick up more concrete information about the city and the surrounding area. We - Alda and Christian- as geographers, like to chat about the diversity of nature in this country, and as a bi-national family, about social and cultural themes of life in Chile.
